settings.text:
Feel free to connect with us anytime if you have any questions or concerns. Our dedicated customer service team is here to assist you with everything from placing orders to tracking deliveries and providing product details. Even if you're all set, we'd still love to hear your feedback. Your opinions matter greatly to us, and we're committed to continuously improving to better serve you.

After-Sale:

Should you need assistance with product logistics, exchanges, or any other post-purchase inquiries, please don't hesitate to reach out to us at service@sylvoxtv.com.

Pre-Sale:

For pre-sales questions, such as inquiries about purchasing multiple units or product specifications, feel free to reach out to us at presale@sylvoxtv.com

Service Hotline: +1 (866) 979-5869

(Monday-Friday, 9:00AM-5:00PM EST)

Warehouse Address: 1440 Brooks St. Suite #4 Ontario, CA, 91762. 

Hongkong Office: 5th Floor, Tai Yip Building, 141 Thomson Road, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
